summary: Tested ringtone download and share functionality. Backend API working correctly with ringtone URLs. Frontend loads successfully on localhost but has critical issues with public URL access and button interactivity.

ui_bugs.issue: External URL https://simple-tone-db.preview.emergentagent.com shows 'Web server returned an unknown error'
Bell/notification icon not detectable by automated testing tools despite being visually present

integration_issues.issue: Cannot access ringtone modal due to unclickable bell button in automated tests

passed_tests: Backend API /api/instrumentals/featured returns correct data with ringtone URLs
Track 'Mawla Ya Salli - Peaceful' has valid ringtone URL: https://azjankari.in/audio/song2.mp3
Player opens and displays track information correctly
UI renders correctly with all visual elements present
action_item_for_main_agent: 1. Fix public URL access issue - external URL returns 'Web server returned an unknown error'. 2. Investigate why TouchableOpacity buttons (especially ringtone bell icon) are not detectable by automated testing tools - may need to add proper data-testid attributes or ensure proper web accessibility. 3. Test ringtone download/share functionality manually once button accessibility is fixed.
